fee_variations.description: For Territory sizes exceeding 70,000 households, an additional $1.00 per household is added up to 100,000 households.
Negotiated reduced Initial Franchise Fee for acquiring more than five Territories at the same time.
For a Territory size of up to 35,000 households. If Territory size exceeds 35,000 households, an additional $1.00 per household is added up to 45,000 households.
For existing franchisees operating an AHS Business for at least six months, meeting qualifications, and purchasing an additional Territory.
For owners of an existing affiliate-acquired franchise in compliance for at least one year, meeting qualifications.
For veterans of the United States Armed Forces with an honorable discharge, applied to the first Franchise Agreement.

refund_policy: All of the initial fees described in this ITEM 5 are fully earned by us on signing of the Franchise Agreement and are entirely non-refundable in all events.
payment_terms: Due in full upon the signing of the Franchise Agreement.
